Alces 0.9.9.1

Alces is a tool for black box testing the JMF functionality of a Worker.

org.cip4.elk.alces.util  

 

Alces is a tool for black box testing the JMF functionality of a Worker.

You can use Alces for scripted automated testing or for interactive manual testing.

If you want to script Alces you should consult the documentation for TestRunner and take a look at the sample script that comes bundled with Alces: bin/acles.js
